text: Borodino () is a rural locality (a village) in Klyapovskoye Rural Settlement, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 7 as of 2010. == Geography == It is located 7.5 km south-east from Beryozovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
title: Borodino, Perm Krai
